info

Hi! i'm Desteny (b. 2000, Puerto Rico), you can also call me des (he/she) ^_^

I'm a Web Development and Web Design enthusiast studying Computer Science @ University of Puerto Rico, Río Piedras.

I've always loved creating things. Making hand-coded websites with HTML/CSS/JS is my latest obsession
and i love it very much ヾ(＠⌒ー⌒＠)ノ

Currently available for any interships or work! Anything related to web development is preferrable.
